gaps: This module does not derive Koide from TFPT; it only records the diagnostic value and deviation.
spec.name: Koide constraints (charged leptons; diagnostic docking check)
objective: Provide an explicit, citeable Koide diagnostic as a docking point for future topology/mass-ratio derivations.
outputs: deviation from 2/3 (diagnostic; not a TFPT derivation yet)
spec.question: Do charged lepton pole masses satisfy the Koide relation (diagnostic)?
validation: Reports Q and deviation; check is a diagnostic PASS/WARN only (not a ToE gate).
